title: MSFT_RigidBodies glTF extension
description: Parameters describing how the relative motion of a pair of nodes is constrained.

connectedNode.description: The ID of the node to which this is connected. If not set then the node will be connected to a fixed point in space.

jointLimits.description: The index of the joint limits in the top level physicsJointLimits array.

enableCollision.description: Allow the connected objects to collide. Connected objects do not collide by default.
